actions.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for parole for an alien into the United States, grant deferred action of a final order of removal, or any reason other than on a case-by-case basis for urgent humanitarian reasons or significant public benefit.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used to parole an alien into the United States, or grant deferred action of a final order of removal, for any reason other than on a case-by-case basis for urgent humanitarian reasons or significant public benefit.
